website_summaries.verdict: The Panasonic Lumix DC-GH5 is the mirrorless camera to get for 4K video, but if you're more concerned about stills, it's not a clear-cut winner.

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: If you are considering spending this much money on the camera, you know all about it Simply a stunning camera. It’s closest competitor is the much cheaper black magic cinema pocket camera, also a fantastic bit of kit, but this feels so rugged and stable in your hand. The build quality is amazing, but the end result is even better I’ve used the predecessor GH4 for national news reports. This is a welcome step up
customer_reviews.author: SRP DILLEY

customer_reviews.title: My favourite camera
customer_reviews.text: I use this for commercial and documentary filmmaking and photography. I am trained on all kinds of professional cameras, so can't speak for myself, but I have given instructional workshops for the gh5 and find that peole catch on quite quickly. It's easy and intuitive to handle and takes beautiful pictures and footage but does have a very specific look which won't work for all styles/genres and needs to be learned how to use. Never let's me down though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied buy and in 2020 holds its own as  a very capable camera
customer_reviews.text: For 2020 I think this is now one of the best times to buy the GH5 especially if you are upgrading from the very likeable GH4, like myself which still had kept its resale value even after a few years of use, after manually setting up with my original GH4 camera settings, I have found the GH5 second nature to use and now making full use of its stabilisation as well as 4.2.2 capabilities, focus transition function, live cropping and my go to when I am out without a tripod, I.S video lock. After a year of commercial use, Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Jools

customer_reviews.title: Best micro 4/3rds on the market!!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say except wow! Even though it’s micro 4/3rds the image you get from this small sensor is outstanding. Articulating screen, 180fps max slow mo, 4K 60fps, great battery life. Highly recommend buy.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Davey

customer_reviews.title: Bootleg copy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged, box totally ripped open, missing the main lens, and looks like a Chinese bootleg as it didn't match the image on here. This is generally a great piece of kit based on the specs alone, but I could see straight away that this wasn't a genuine Lumix camera. Cannot comment on the performance as didn't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Excellent usability and quality!
customer_reviews.text: For the pricetag it's a winner. The video capabilities are incredible and it takes nice pictures as well! I really love it. Massive step up from my old canon 600D. Obviously not as good as a 5D Mark II but for the pricetag I'd highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: jalf

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera for micro four thirds
customer_reviews.text: Now before I start, this isn't a review about the camera, if you want that, youtube is your friend as we all have different needs when it comes to a camera and my tuppence isn't even worth that! The delivery and service from Amazon was tip top as per usual, no problems with any part of the purchase or item since delivery.
customer_reviews.author: R. ADAMS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Can’t be beaten for price!
customer_reviews.text: What a camera for the price. Don’t let the you tubers get to you about autofocus. If you know what you are doing it works well for interviews or slow moving action.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Lilley

customer_reviews.title: ... huge leap in quality output over my G3 - Love
customer_reviews.text: There is so much to this camera - and a huge leap in quality output over my G3 - Love it
customer_reviews.author: Simon Springate

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended. Work with it professionally. Greta picture quality and has many, many capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: Chrishugh

customer_reviews.title: Defo worth buying
customer_reviews.text: The is stabilisation is fantastic even with lenses without IS
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera Shame About The Focussing.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, HOWEVER, the focussing is really annoying, Even with the new software updates. Check out some footage on my Youtube channel. UKMacMaster and look at London Bound, you'll see the focussing is not that great.
customer_reviews.author: The MacMaster

product_meta.title: Panasonic LUMIX DC-GH5EB-K Compact System Mirrorless Camera Body only - Black
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Body OnlyThe LUMIX GH5 packs a real punch with its high performance Digital Live MOS sensor sporting a 20.3 megapixels to achieve the highest picture quality in the history of LUMIX G compact system cameras. Together with the removal of the low-pass filter from the sensor, you can confidently capture the sharpest & artefact free image with high dynamic range. The LUMIX GH5 is a camera of beauty created by you and crafted by Panasonic engineering. To reset the camera, you will need to carry out the following: Set the mode dial to P. Press the menu/set button. Select the setup option. Scroll through the setup listings until you get to 'reset'. Select the reset option to reset your camera. Once the camera has reset, you will need to turn it off and back on again. You will then be prompted to set the date and time.

BOX CONTAINS
DC-GH5EB-K, Battery Charger (AC Cable included), Battery Pack, Body Cap, Hot Shoe Cover, Eye Cup, Flash Synchro Socket Cap, Cover for the Battery Grip Connector, USB Connection Cable, Shoulder Strap, Cable Holder
feature_bullets: The marriage of an advanced Digital Live MOS sensor with the beautiful new Venus Engine 10 reproduces extraordinary colour detail and natural texture expression. The Three-Dimensional Colour Control with rich colours from dark to bright shades and high-precision Multi Process NR makes your images stand out.

It’s difficult to handhold a camera at the best of times but thanks to the 5-axis Dual image Stabiliser 2 Intelligent compensation comes to your aid. The LUMIX GH5 eliminates shakes in both body and lens from wide-angle to tele-end.

Faster frame rates mean excellent motion compensation Plus you can slow down footage inside your video editing timeline without losing detail. You also achieve perfect panning control and a suppression of the rolling shutter Effect as seen in lesser frame rates.

High-resolution images and perfect focal length can also be achieved as the LUMIX GH5 features Pixel for Pixel, no sensor Cropping recording. There's also no recording duration Limit so you can go beyond 30 minutes in all record settings.
The LUMIX GH5 brings game changing internal 4:2:2 10-bit 4K video recording. The power of having film creation capabilities inside the camera sets a new precedent in guerrilla style filmmaking.

Dfd (depth from defocus) allows the camera to calculate focal lens movement by comparing depth of field values of two images at incredibly high speed. A motion detector accurately tracks fast moving subjects, and enables smooth 4K photo/video & 6K photo recording.

Shoot with unlimited Burst, then choose and extract the exact frames you want to keep. The new 6K photo mode at 30fps allows you to capture the perfect moments at a stunning approx.18-Megapixel high-resolution.

It is freeze proof down to -10-degrees in addition to splash / dustproof construction thanks to weather sealing on every joint, dial and button. A magnesium alloy full die cast armour frame makes the body lightweight yet durable while bringing ruggedness to the compact size.

A super high-resolution 3, 680k-dot OLED LVF (live view finder) brings gorgeous visibility and makes for perfect framing even under direct sunlight. Best of all, the OLED LVF ensures your pictures match up to exactly how you intended them.
Compatible with the new “LUMIX Tether for Streaming (Beta)” software program for PC

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars49 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
